abstract: Guam becomes first United States territory to recognize same-sex marriage after Judge Frances Tydingco-Gatewood strikes down ban.
lead_paragraph: Gay couples began applying for marriage licenses Tuesday after Guam became the first United States territory to recognize same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Guam: Gay Couples Allowed to Marry
headline.print_headline: Guam: Gay Couples Allowed to Marry

snippet: Gay couples began applying for marriage licenses Tuesday after Guam became the first United States territory to recognize same-sex marriage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
